mapper.select: select distinct t1.*, if(t2.valid_flag = 0, 0, 1) as "isCurrentUserFavorite" from (select thc.id as "id", tsu.avatar as "userAvatar", tsu.user_account as "username", thc.content as "commentContent", thc.comment_time as "commentTime", thc.favorite_count as "commentFavoriteCount", thc.reply_count as "commentReplyCount" from t_homepage_comment thc left join t_sys_user tsu on thc.comment_owner = tsu.user_id and tsu.alive_flag = 0 where thc.opus_id = #{aid}) t1 left join t_homepage_favorite t2 on t1.id = t2.comment_id and t2.user_id = #{userId} order by t1.commentTime desc

select * from t_homepage_article left join t_sys_config tsc limit #{startIndex},#{pageSize}
select tha.id as id, tha.title as title, tha.read_times as readTimes, tha.collect_times as collectTimes, tha.content as content, (select tsc.desc_ch from t_sys_config tsc where tsc.category='article_category' and tsc.full_value =tha.category) as category, (select group_concat(tsc.desc_ch separator ', ') from t_sys_config tsc where tsc.category='article_tag' and tsc.full_value in ($P!{tha.tags})) as tags, tha.release_time as releaseTime from t_homepage_article tha limit 1,3
